member.name: IMAPI_MODE_PAGE_TYPE
member.summary: Defines values for the mode pages that are supported by CD and DVD devices.

member.name: IMAPI_MODE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_MODE_PAGE_TYPE_READ_WRITE_ERROR_RECOVERY
member.summary: The mode page specifies the error recovery parameters the drive uses during any command that performs a data read or write operation from the media.

member.name: IMAPI_MODE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_MODE_PAGE_TYPE_MRW
member.summary: The mode page provides a method by which the host may control the special features of a MRW CD-RW Drive.

member.name: IMAPI_MODE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_MODE_PAGE_TYPE_WRITE_PARAMETERS
member.summary: The mode page provides parameters that are often needed in the execution of commands that write to the media.

member.name: IMAPI_MODE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_MODE_PAGE_TYPE_CACHING
member.summary: The mode page contains parameters to enable or disable caching during read or write operations.

member.name: IMAPI_MODE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_MODE_PAGE_TYPE_INFORMATIONAL_EXCEPTIONS
member.summary: The mode page contains parameters for exception reporting mechanisms that result in specific sense code errors when failures are predicted. This mode page is related to the feature.

member.name: IMAPI_MODE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_MODE_PAGE_TYPE_TIMEOUT_AND_PROTECT
member.summary: The mode page contains command time-out values that are suggested by the device.

member.name: IMAPI_MODE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_MODE_PAGE_TYPE_POWER_CONDITION
member.summary: The mode page contains power management settings for the drive. The parameters define how long the logical unit delays before changing its internal power state.

member.name: IMAPI_MODE_PAGE_TYPE.IMAPI_MODE_PAGE_TYPE_LEGACY_CAPABILITIES
member.summary: The mode page contains legacy device capabilities. These are superseded by the feature pages returned through the GetConfiguration command.
